title: Modern Mangalsutra - Rose Gold Love
features: A contemporary take on the traditional mangalsutra. This necklace features delicate rose gold charms shaped like hearts, each set with sparkling Cubic Zirconia stones. The black beads are strung meticulously between the gold accents. The rose gold provides a soft, romantic touch.
occasions: as a modern expression of commitment and love.
description: This mangalsutra combines tradition with a modern design, making it a versatile piece for everyday wear. The rose gold adds a touch of elegance, while the heart-shaped charms symbolize love and commitment. Durable construction ensures it will last for years to come. Perfect for the modern woman who values both tradition and style.
